Description:
A group of pirates is busy salvaging what appears to be an endless stash of crates, but what truly catches your eye are the symbols painted on some of them. 

They resemble the crest you found in Senenthia, though they are not an exact match. Unfortunately, the symbols on the crates are too damaged to confirm any specific details.

Perhaps the pirates can help you uncover more information about the emblem.
DescriptionAction: Are you still interested in uncovering the mysteries of the symbol?

    "SSRewardText": "There are notable similarities between the crest you discovered in Senenthia and the symbols on the boxes, so you decide to ask the pirates for confirmation.\r\n\nThe pirates explain that this resembles the symbol of House Colro, a group of Senenthian explorers who joined Halfman in his pursuit of pirates. They swore to abandon their exploration duties until the Sahti waters were cleansed of evil. Halfman's monstrous ship and its crew eventually drained all of House Colro's resources, but the explorers remained true to their word until the bitter end. \r\n\nAccording to the pirates, it is said that they still sail with the great captain to this very day. \r\n\nThe tale of this Senenthian noble house that fought for a better world until the end serves as a reminder of how bound to their word a true noble is. Noblesse obliges, after all!",

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "(Andrin): “The symbol on the boxes looks like the emblem of the Colro cousins' house. They were explorers, but they disappeared in the Sahti Islands. Rumors say they joined some captain to fight piracy, but... I don’t know what to believe.\r\n\nI’m certain the crest we found in Senenthia does not represent House Colro. We should search elsewhere, but let’s ask those pirates if they’ll let us loot some boxes first.”\r\n\nThe pirates agree to let you loot a few boxes with the symbol that caught your interest. Inside, you find some very old magical shards.",

    "SSRewardText": "(Sigrun): “I remember seeing crates in the Sahti village with the same symbol. One day, I asked about it, and the elder told me it was the emblem of the noble Senenthian House Colro. They were so charmed by the Sahti people that they decided to invest all their wealth in fighting the pirates.\r\n\nI’m certain the crest we found in Senenthia does not represent House Colro. We should search elsewhere. I find it ironic that we have to ask these pirates if they’ll let us loot some boxes bearing House Colro’s symbol, but it may be useful to take a look before leaving.”\r\n\nThe pirates agree to let you loot a few boxes with the symbol that caught your interest. Inside, you find some very old magical shards.",

    "SSRewardText": "(Bernard): “Long ago, a Senenthian noble family, House Colro, came to the Sahti Islands looking for new routes and places to explore. However, it is said that they were so troubled by the evil that plagued these islands that they swore to end piracy before resuming their explorations. Shortly after, they disappeared. The emblem painted on those crates is the same as that of House Colro.\r\n\nMmm... I’m certain the crest we found in Senenthia does not represent House Colro. We should search elsewhere, but let’s ask these pirates if they’ll let us loot some boxes first.”\r\n\nThe pirates agree to let you loot a few boxes with the symbol that caught your interest. Inside, you find some very old magical shards.",
